TopicTitle: How to put Kerbal Space Program on Russian

Articles.Content:
привет (Hi)

I wanted to use ksp in russian and i have 1.3 so it's possible for me anyone know how?

@CheeseMonger Did you get your version of KSP from the KSP store or on Steam?

If using Steam you right-click the name of your game and chose Properties. In the next window there should be a Language tab at the top with a list that says "Select the language you wish to play this game in:"

If you downloaded the game from the KSP store then you need to go to the website https://kerbalspaceprogram.com and choose the Store tab at the top. You will need to sign in with your account info and then click the orange MY ACCOUNT button.

On the next screen, click the blue "Download" button next to the copy of KSP that you have already purchased. Next, in the dropdown box marked "OS" pick your operating system, such as Windows or Mac. Then in the Language box choose the Russian language selection. After you have done this press "Get Links."

There will be a Russian language patch file listed for 1.3. You don't have to download the whole game again, just run the .exe file that downloads from the Russian language patch.

It might be a good idea to make a backup copy of your entire KSP directory and save it to another location first. Just in case anything goes wrong or if you want to easily play the English language version again. You can run both copies of the game from either location.
